title: Chamomile
text: Chamomile is known for its calming effects and is commonly used in tea to promote sleep.

title: Peppermint
text: Peppermint helps with digestion and can relieve headaches and nausea.

title: Dandelion
text: Dandelion greens, are a great source of vitamins and minerals such as: Vitamins A, C and K, Folate, Calcium, Potassium

title: Lavender
text: Lavender is commonly used to reduce anxiety, improve sleep, and relieve pain.

title: Eucalyptus
text: Eucalyptus is used to relieve cold symptoms and clear nasal congestion. Its oil has antiseptic properties.

title: Ginger
text: Ginger helps reduce nausea, ease digestion, and fight inflammation.

title: Turmeric
text: Turmeric has anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. It may help with joint pain and overall immunity.

title: Aloe Vera
text: Aloe Vera is known for soothing skin burns, moisturizing the skin, and aiding digestion when consumed in moderation.

title: Lemongrass
text: Lemongrass has antibacterial and antifungal properties and is often used to aid digestion and relieve stress.

title: Basil
text: Basil is used to relieve inflammation, reduce stress, and improve digestion. Holy basil is especially valued in Ayurvedic medicine.

title: Rosemary
text: Rosemary is said to improve memory and concentration. It also contains antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds.
